metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3807 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions 4.1.x before 4.1.9 where records in the answer section of responses received from authoritative servers with the AA flag not set were not properly validated, allowing an attacker to bypass DNSSEC validation.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.9-1').
